name: Application for Tax Waiver/Exemption (GIPC)
description: Template for applying for strategic investor status and associated tax waivers/exemptions through GIPC.

clauses.clause_text:
TO: The Chief Executive Officer
Ghana Investment Promotion Centre (GIPC)
Accra, Ghana

DATE: {{application_date}}
RE: Application for Strategic Investor Status and Tax Exemptions by {{company_name}} (GIPC Reg No: {{gipc_reg_number}}).
The Applicant is invested in a major project in the {{sector_name}} sector with a total investment value of {{total_investment_value}} (USD), located at {{project_site}}.

The project is expected to create {{job_count}} direct jobs for Ghanaians and contribute to the national economy through {{economic_benefits}} (e.g. import substitution, export earnings, technology transfer).

Pursuant to Section 26 of the GIPC Act, 2013 (Act 865), the Applicant requests the following: (a) Exemption from import duties on plant and machinery; (b) {{specific_tax_exemption}} (e.g. 5-year corporate tax holiday); (c) Exemption from VAT on capital goods.

We certify that all information provided is true and we agree to comply with all reporting requirements set by GIPC and the Ghana Revenue Authority (GRA).

____________________
{{signature_name}}
Managing Director
